frozen_definition.name: SpeakDaily
frozen_definition.signal_source: Language learning analysis: 'friend has 1,500-day streak but struggles with speaking fluently' and 'memorizing translations instead of thinking'
frozen_definition.description: Speaking-first language practice app with 60-second daily conversations that prioritize actual communication over lessons
frozen_definition.target_user: Language learners who maintain long streaks but can't speak confidently and want practical conversation skills
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Long-term users report 'gamified apps lock learners into habits that stall real fluency'
core_loop: Get feedback on pronunciation and flow
frozen_definition.differentiation: Speaking-first vs. reading/writing focus, real conversation over theoretical lessons
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes native speaker feedback, advanced conversation topics, and cultural context

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic conversations, premium for native feedback and advanced topics
